main event: A large object appeared as a light on the horizon observed by military personnel at Goose AFB, Labrador, Canada, on August 29, 1959.
interesting points: The object was first seen at 2107 and was not observed to land or take off., The object was described as moving faster than a star., The sighting lasted for approximately 25 minutes., Observers included experienced pilots with military backgrounds., The observed object made no sound during the sighting.
witness description: Flight Lieutenant M.S. Mowat, an RCAF rated pilot
